title: ATB 101 Project
description: Winning team for the "Capstone Project". It is a case competition-like format, but it lasts 4 months and each team of 10 tackled different problems.

title: Gallery In Three.js HackED Beta 2017
description: Gallery in Three.js is a 3-D gallery app made in Three.js, which is a 3-D Javascript library. The web application has three modes, in which GIFS are displayed on the walls in a hallway that you can walk through. This hack won in the category: Best Web/Data Hack

title: Tindin HackED 2020
description: Have you ever wanted to date someone AND potentially hire them? Well now you can do any linear combination of the two!

title: Connect 4 WASM ðŸ¦€
description: Connect 4 and Toot and Otto, written in Rust

title: Arduino Chess
description: Player vs. Player implementation of Chess, on the Arduino. Includes some special moves like En Passant and Castling

title: Arch Linux Install Script
description: Personalized install; script that will wipe your hard drive, install arch, and copy my dotfiles over. I use Arch, btw

title: Slack Meme Bot
description: Will spam memes on your behalf in a slack channel of your choice. Intervals between posts follow a gamma distribution so as to not arouse suspicion from your peers...

title: Rust WASM Snek
description: A basic snake game written in Rust + Webassembly. Draws on an HTML canvas.

title: acat
description: Arun's cat. A cat clone that pukes skittles

title: Rezz Goggles
description: I wanted an excuse to play with my Arduinos, and LED glasses look cool. This one is still a work in progress.
